```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(bbbq)
library(netmhc2pan)
```


Greenbaum et al. [1], published the following list of MHC-II haplotype occurances:

```{r}
knitr::kable(head(bbbq::get_mhc2_haplotype_occurance()))
```

NetMHC2pan has these haplotypes:

```{r}
head(netmhc2pan::get_netmhc2pan_alleles())
```

Here we find out which NetMHC2pan haplotypes we will be using.

```{r}
df <- bbbq::get_mhc2_haplotype_occurance()
df$name <- df$haplotype
```
